com.faltro.houdoku.model

Class Chapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.model.Chapter

  • public class Chapter
extends java.lang.Object
    An individual release of a chapter for a Series.

    A series can have multiple chapters with the same number, since the content source may provide multiple groups' scanlations for the chapter.

    • Method Detail

      • sanitizePageNumber

        private void sanitizePageNumber()
        Ensures that currentPageNum is valid.

        Checks that the currentPageNum is neither less than 0 nor greater than the total number of pages.

      • setMetadata

        private void setMetadata(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> metadata)
        Sets the "metadata" content of this object.

        The following fields are stored:

        • chapterNum (double)
        • volumeNum (int)
        • language (Language)
        • group (String)
        • views (int)
        • localDateTime (LocalDateTime)
        Parameters:
        metadata - a HashMap where keys are the field names listed above as Strings and values of the matching type

      • specificPage

        public void specificPage(int pageNum)
        Changes currentPageNum to the requested page.

        This method by itself does not load the image on the new page.

        Parameters:
        pageNum - the page to change to, where 1 is the first page

      • deltaPage

        public void deltaPage(int delta)
        Changes currentPageNum by a specified delta.

        This method by itself does not load the image on the new page.

        Parameters:
        delta - the (positive or negative) number of pages to change by

      • clearImages

        public void clearImages()
        Clears the array of images.

        Expected to be called when the user is not expected to continue viewing the images, in order to free up memory when the image data is cleared from memory by the garbage collector.
